title: UFYB 108: When You Feel Triggered
itunes:title: When You Feel Triggered
description:
Join me this week as I share the process I use when I feel triggered to grow and learn more about myself. I want this episode to act as a reminder that taking actions to move away from what feels bad isn’t a solution, and that there is so much missed opportunity when you do this.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://unfuckyourbrain.com/108
content:encoded:
Join me this week as I share the process I use when I feel triggered to grow and learn more about myself. I want this episode to act as a reminder that taking actions to move away from what feels bad isn’t a solution, and that there is so much missed opportunity when you do this.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://unfuckyourbrain.com/108
itunes:subtitle: What you miss out on when you indulge in feeling triggered.
itunes:author: Kara Loewentheil
